channel.title: Endless-hood V1 [First ever release] [316 DOWNLOADS!]
channel.description:
[size=7]Endless-hood v1[/size] [size=5]if you see this on anythink accept this and silabsoft its leeched[/size]
This is my first ever release and source, so dont be to harsh lol.
Updates:
-New home -New pkbox -Added fightpits -Added a pkzone (no safe area) -New starter -New starter outfit (when you log in) -Changed the login place (first time on server) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Player commands
::starter ::home ::wc ::yell ::food ::smith ::skills ::rep ::afk ::back ::gsmini ::suggest ~~~~~~ Mod commands + all commands above
::kick ::notedbarrows ::az ::pure ::god ::alert ::sit ::m ::sweet ::modlook ::mypk ::alert ~~~~~~~ Admin commands + all commands above
::banuser ::unban ::pnpc ::pickup ::npc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::k0 ::xrichie ::god ::adminlook ~~~~~~~~ Owner commands + all commands above
::ownerlook ::ipban ::getpass ::setlvls ::eat ::update ::giveadmin ::givemod ::demote~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Pictures
New home - i added
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-34-02.png[/img]
New pkbox

::afk

::back
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-42-00.png[/img]

Starter

New starter outfit - I made
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-36-31.png[/img]
New starter outfit (normal)
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-36-14.png[/img]
Mod look
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-56-14.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2008, 01:36:52 pm[/size][hr]Admin look
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-56-29.png[/img]
Owner look
[img]http://i520.photobucket.com/albums/w328/ash-dude34/27-09-200819-49-22.png[/img]
ok thats about all really, considering its my first source
Endless-hood V2 will be out SOON
